reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 297/02: COUNCIL COMPOSITION, REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF NIAGARA
reg_info.reg_name_text: COUNCIL COMPOSITION, REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF NIAGARA
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.section: Application of s. 27 of the Act
content.content: 1. (1) Section 27 of the Act applies to The Regional Municipality of Niagara. O. Reg. 297/02, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) does not apply to the council of The Regional Municipality of Niagara that is elected in the regular election in 2003. O. Reg. 297/02, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Section 27 of the Act applies to The Regional Municipality of Niagara. O. Reg. 297/02, s. 1 (1).

(2) Subsection (1) does not apply to the council of The Regional Municipality of Niagara that is elected in the regular election in 2003. O. Reg. 297/02, s. 1 (2).

content.section: Application of s. 27 of the Act
content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 297/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 297/02, s. 2.
